name: Valorant (Level Remake)
description:
VIDEO PLAYTHROUGH

This is my first project created using Unreal Engine for mostly level design with some small programming goals such as the weapon switch and drop, bullet damage and enemy function. 

This project was created in order to replicate a part of a map from an existing game known as Valorant. You can visualize the similarities via the screenshots provided on the right side of the screen. Otherwise, you could download and use the small level as a sandbox to test the features I implemented. 

These features include;

  • Being able to switch weapons and even drop them on the ground and pick them up again.
  • Weapons have different damage and bullets.
  • Enemy always face the player when they reach their aggro range. 
  • Damage effects on enemies.
  • Level design representing the original as closely as possible using assets available to me.
